titleInfo.title: The radiator gas and the gas system of COMPASS RICH-1

mods.abstract: The design of the COMPASS RICH-1 gas system, its operational modes, the cleaning setups for the preparation of the radiator gas and transmission measurement installations are described. The gas system in presently fully operational and satisfactory transmission of VUV light through the radiator gas has been reached. (C) 2003 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.
